titles.title: Education Savings for Students Act of 2007
A bill to permanently increase the maximum annual contribution allowed to be made to Coverdell education savings accounts.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Introduced. Education Savings for Students Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the maximum annual contribution limit for Coverdell education savings accounts from $2,000 to $5,000 and make such increase permanent.
